ORCS Documentation¶

ORCS (Outils de Réduction de Cubes Spectraux) is a data extraction software for cubes reduced with ORBS. It is aimed to produce parameter maps for all the lines present in the spectrum cube.

Warning

This is still a development version of ORCS. You might see bugs or strange behaviours ! You might also want desperatly to have new features. In all cases please send me an email: thomas.martin.1@ulaval.ca
